system.description:
Art District Hub Move

When you posture for clout in front of well-connected NPCs, roll with MIND.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, your humblebragging attracts the attention of a rival to whom you owe an uncomfortably large Debt; take -1 ongoing when refusing to honor your Debts to anyone from their Circle until time passes.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, they buy your ruse; take +1 Status with a relevant Circle until time passes or your deception is revealed.

On a 7-9, they require you to prove yourself or risk retribution.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, they buy your ruse; take +1 Status with a relevant Circle until time passes or your deception is revealed.
